front.title: Context and Goals for Common Name Resolution

abstract.t: This document establishes the context and goals for a Common NameResolution Protocol. It defines the terminology used concerning a'Common Name' and how one might be 'resolved', and establishes thedistinction between 'resolution' and more elaborate searchmechanisms. It establishes some expected contexts for use of CommonName Resolution, and the criteria for evaluating a successfulprotocol. It also analyzes the various motivations that would causeservices to provide Common Name resolution for both public, privateand commercial use.
